text: Hello team! Can anyone tell me what this means? What are we missing? "Quote with 'portalId' of (ID) and 'quoteId' of (ID) failed update validation. Please correct the errors and then re-submit : Quotes with status 'APPROVAL_NOT_NEEDED' and templateType 'CUSTOMIZABLE_QUOTE_TEMPLATE' must have an associated 'QUOTE_TEMPLATE' object.". This is not via through API quote creation - this is from using the "Add Quote Button" in deals. We have not made any edits to this template for 3 years and just getting this error today...
